content:
Sure! Here's an updated version of the email for Kirkwood Mountain Resort:

Subject: Food Truck Inquiry

Dear Kirkwood Mountain Resort Team,

I am writing to inquire about the possibility of operating my food truck at your resort during the winter season. I am a local food vendor and I believe that my offerings would be a great fit for the Kirkwood community.

I am interested in setting up my food truck at a location near the base of the mountain, where I can serve skiers, snowboarders, and other visitors. My menu includes a variety of hot and cold options, including sandwiches, soups, salads, and snacks.

I understand that there may be certain rules and regulations governing food trucks at Kirkwood, and I would be happy to comply with any requirements and obtain any necessary permits or licenses. Could you please provide me with information on the process for applying to operate a food truck at Kirkwood, as well as any requirements or fees associated with doing so?

Thank you for your time and consideration. I look forward to hearing back from you and potentially bringing my food truck to Kirkwood this winter season.

Best regards,

[Your Name]
